abstract.t: Introducing new or modified congestion controller algorithms in the global Internet have possible ramifications to both the traffic using the new method and to traffic using a standardized congestion control algorithm. Therefore, the IETF must proceed with caution when evaluating proposals for alternate congestion control. The goal of this document is to provide guidance for considering standardization of an alternate congestion control algorithm at the IETF. It replaces RFC5033 to reflect changes in the congestion control landscape.
